body:
Yush.

Introduction
I'm MilkCream, going into 9th grade in early September and prepared for every high school math competition I'll be attending. Obviously, I love math; I've been competing since 6th grade, starting with the AMC8. I also like Piano and gaming. The two major games I play at the moment are Minecraft and osu!
I support #JozzForPresident and #PeachyForOwner.

But enough with that. Ask me whatever you want....under one condition.
R. Q. T.
Please answer at least 3 of the following if you ask me a question, one of them being number 7:
1. How many licks does it take to consume two scoops of strawberry ice cream?
2. If a tree is 8 feet in diameter and it is a perfect cylinder, how many times will you need to hit it with an axe to make it fall?
3. Name a random number. This includes negatives, nonintegrals, and imaginary numbers.
4. Your most hated fruit?
5. Jozz for President?
6. Frozen Yogurt or Ice Cream?
7. What do you think RQT stands for?
If you have already answered questions, you do not need to answer questions again.

Sankyuu~
And that's all! Enjoy asking me questions!

This post was made in China
EDIT 1: Clarification made, questions 1 and 2 changed to increase interesting level by 2.

replies.body:
@cinammoncroc000:
Dream job would undecided but would involve either math or CS, so maybe a programmer or a mathematician.
My mouse is a plain old Logitech mouse.
1+1 depends on how you think: It's 2 in base 10, 10 in base 2, and 110 in base -2. Jozz's vice president would be Peachy <3
@smitdalt: My favorite genre of music depends on the day: it could be classical, dubstep, or happycore.
Cake. All the way. <3
How did I get my username? Oh boy, that's a question that I expected but I knew would be a long story. You better be prepared.
First things first, I've always loved dairy products such as milk and cheese, and I have no idea why.
Now, the story starts when I was randomly searching Kongregate for Multiplayer games. After a while, I found a game titled "Realm of the Mad God." I took a look at it, didn't think much of it, and then stopped.
Later, I picked up the game again, and got addicted. At that time, there was a professional guild known as "Mafia" that played this game. They later changed the guild to "Cream."
Fast forward a few months, and I started getting bored of the game. My birthday was coming up in a few months, and I had heard of Minecraft being the new "thing," so I decided to get that for my birthday. I decided to come up with a good name. I thought of Cream because of the professional guild and also because of my love of dairy products, but I found out Cream was taken.
So, I thought, "what's cream made out of again? Right, milk." So I tried CreamMilk. Didn't work. Finally, I went with MilkCream.
And that's the story of my name!

1. How many licks does it take to consume two scoops of strawberry ice cream? 24
2. If a tree is 8 feet in diameter and it is a perfect cylinder, how many times will you need to hit it with an axe to make it fall? 4
3. Name a random number. This includes negatives, nonintegrals, and imaginary numbers. -5076655
4. Your most hated fruit? ...Avocado 
5. Jozz for President? Omg yes!
6. Frozen Yogurt or Ice Cream? ICE ICE CREAM
7. What do you think RQT stands for? Random Question Time!
NOW.

 Do you like Cows?

Dashie or Pinkie?

Do I live outside you window?
I saw you eat cake last night?
DUN DONE DAN
